input.description: Use case type. For example: ServiceDown
Connection information related to target in the event data

Output data from pre-triage actions:
If empty, then supply:
<pretriage-response-data />
Collection of status and decision flags. By defualt it is as below: <flags />. At this stage it is atleast as below: <flags> <status>success</status> </flags>

output.value: Skipping triage due to earlier errors.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootName" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="flags"> <xsl:element name="{$rootName}"> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> <remediation-required>${remediation required}</remediation-required> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(drop-event) = false"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="not(contains('${status}', 'success'))"> <drop-event> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </drop-event> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(triage-status) = false"> <triage-status> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${status}</xsl:text> </triage-status> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="continue-processing"> <continue-processing> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'success' and '${remediation required}' = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </continue-processing> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="status"> <status>${status}</status> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="drop-event"> <drop-event> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </drop-event> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="triage-status"> <triage-status>${status}</triage-status> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.value: Skipping triage due to earlier errors.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootName" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="flags"> <xsl:element name="{$rootName}"> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> <remediation-required>${remediation required}</remediation-required> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(drop-event) = false"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="not(contains('${status}', 'success'))"> <drop-event> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </drop-event> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(triage-status) = false"> <triage-status> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${status}</xsl:text> </triage-status> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="continue-processing"> <continue-processing> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'success' and '${remediation required}' = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </continue-processing> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="status"> <status>${status}</status> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="drop-event"> <drop-event> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </drop-event> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="triage-status"> <triage-status>${status}</triage-status> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

call-process.process-name: :BMC-SA-Event_Orchestration:Utilities:Get Workflow Name by Event Type and Action

input.value: ===========:BMC-SA-Event_Orchestration:Utilities:Get Workflow Name by Event Type and Action ==============

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootName" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="flags"> <xsl:element name="{$rootName}"> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> <remediation-required>${remediation required}</remediation-required> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(drop-event) = false"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="not(contains('${status}', 'success'))"> <drop-event> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </drop-event> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(triage-status) = false"> <triage-status> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${status}</xsl:text> </triage-status> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="continue-processing"> <continue-processing> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'success' and '${remediation required}' = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </continue-processing> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="status"> <status>${status}</status> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="drop-event"> <drop-event> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </drop-event> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="triage-status"> <triage-status>${status}</triage-status> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="targetConnectionData">${target connectoin datsa}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <inputParameters> <inputParameter> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">event data</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </value> </inputParameter> <inputParameter> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">target connection data</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="$targetConnectionData" /> </value> </inputParameter> </inputParameters> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//status/text() = 'success' and //remediation-required/text() = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Triage completed. Remediation is required.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//status/text() = 'success' and //remediation-required/text() = 'false'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Triage completed. Remediation is NOT required:</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Triage failed:</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> ${related event command} <xsl:text /> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <triage-command-history> <xsl:if test="boolean(//command)"> <xsl:copy-of select="//command" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="boolean(//command-output)"> <xsl:copy-of select="//command-output" /> </xsl:if> </triage-command-history> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootName" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="flags"> <xsl:element name="{$rootName}"> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> <remediation-required>${remediation required}</remediation-required> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(drop-event) = false"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="not(contains('${status}', 'success'))"> <drop-event> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </drop-event> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(triage-status) = false"> <triage-status> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${status}</xsl:text> </triage-status> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="continue-processing"> <continue-processing> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'success' and '${remediation required}' = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </continue-processing> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="status"> <status>${status}</status> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="drop-event"> <drop-event> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </drop-event> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="triage-status"> <triage-status>${status}</triage-status> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <triage-response> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </triage-response> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="XML"> <xsl:apply-templates select="./*" /> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="command-output"> <log> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </log> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="//status/text() = 'success'"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//log)"> <xsl:value-of select="//log/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//command-output/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//status/text() = 'success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="//status/text() != 'success'"> <xsl:value-of select="//command-output/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Perform Triage for a given set of inputs: 1. Event Source Type 2. ITSM type 3. All Configurations - All module configurations required to determine if triage is required and type of triage to be performed. 4. Event Data - Incoming event data 5. Flags - if continue-processing is false, traige step is skipped. This could be because event type is not supported. 6. Log error - if true, then, an error is logged in the target event system.
